title: Sam Mucklow quits TOWIE to take pressure off Shelby Tribble romance after engagement
text:

Sam Mucklow has decided to leave the TOWIE cameras behind.

The former TOWIE star said he has bowed out of the show to take the "pressure off" his budding romance with Shelby Tribble.

He has been the centre of the drama on the show after he joined the scene in 2018.

It comes amid rumours the couple are engaged as their TOWIE co-stars congratulated them.

In a lengthy statement uploaded onto Instagram, Sam set out he wanted to continue his romance with Shelby without the "anxiety of the show" having an impact on their relationship.

The cheeky TV star explained he wanted to focus on their romance because it is what is "truly important" to him.

(Image: Instagram)

He said in a statement: "Me and @shelbytribble have never been happier and we are continuing our little fairytale away from the pressure and anxiety from the show. I really feel I have made the right decision to focus on the things that are truly important to me!"

The hunk insisted he hadn't made the decision lightly and had given it great thought as he tried to let his disappointed fans down gently.

Sam pinpointed the jam-packed work schedule as one of the main reasons to why he was leaving the show.

(Image: James Veysey/REX/Shutterstock)

He released in a statement: "GOODBYE TOWIE! I made the decision to leave Towie. It was something I have been contemplating for some time and I finally had to make a decision about what I wanted to do.

"After the away trip in Spain I took a few weeks off of filming to try and get back on top of my work that I had let slide away from me. Juggling filming 3 days a week and trying to manage my various work commitments it was no longer feasible for me to continue on the show.

"After having long discussion with various people at the Towie production company we made the mutual decision that it would be best for me to leave the show.

(Image: Beretta/Sims/REX/Shutterstock)

He went on: "I’m walking away with a smile on my face and a beautiful girl on my arm. Thank you everyone at @towie @limepicturestv & @itvbe ."️

All of the TOWIE stars piled into the comments to express their great sadness at Sam leaving the show.

Chloe and Demi Sims led the crowded comments section with their heartfelt posts for their friend.

The eldest sister wrote: "So SADDDDDD. MOAW!!! But so glad to have had so many funny times with you! You will be missed mamamamaaaaaaa."

Demi added: "I’m gonna miss you bothhhh so much. Wishing yous the best ❤️ LOVE YOUS LOTS ❤️ little. Hopefully see yous soon anyway."

Liam Gatsby chimed in: "Gonna miss filming with u Broski but we still gonna be together every week avin it off."

Sam's decision to leave shortly follows his comments that he was ready to "wind down", live with Shelby and have her kids.

He told Metro: “I’m 27 now, Shelby’s 27 and I want to wind down and calm down. I want to live with her.

“I want to have kids soon and I see that with Shelby. She’ll be such a good mum. She’s great with my nephews, you should see her with them.

"We've spent the whole summer together in Spain, she’s been with my family and my sisters and everyone just loves her."
description: The former TOWIE star said he has bowed out of the show to take the "pressure off" his budding romance with Shelby Tribble
